dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DesiDhabaForums.com]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, July 07, 2005 4:17 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; pritsingh@easyliferecords.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DesiDhabaForums.com]

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

-------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] DesiDhabaForums.com
Date: Thu, 7 Jul 2005 12:25:56 +0100
From: PritSingh (Easylife Records) <pritsingh@easyliferecords.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>,        <legal-response@theplanet.com>

Hello, i am Pritpal Singh from Easylife Records. Remember we emailed each
other in the past before regarding illegal music file sharing. We at
Easylife Records are 100% against piracy of music and do not like our music
being shared anywhere.

We have noticed that desidhabaforums.com  is hosted with you guys.
Desidhabaforums.com have been illegally sharing music on their website.
You need a log in user name and password, once you have entered it brings up
many pages of illegal pirated music. The music being shared is under major
labels such as Genie Records, Moviebox, Us - Easylife Records, Untouchables
Uk and many more other major labels.  I have attached some evidence of this
for you aswell. The actual address is
http://www.desidhabaforums.com/cheetah/. The website is running under
ice-enterprises.com, which is hosted with theplanet.com.

We are under the BPI (British Phonographic Industury - who deal with piracy
over the internet) and we are willing to take action against the owners of
this server/domain.

We would like action taken against this hosting/domain as soon as possible
as it taking our music industury down.

Please check the attachment to show you evidence of this happening.

Many Thanks in advance

Regards,
Prit Singh

Easylife Records Limited
( +44 (0)1926 745913
email: pritsingh@easyliferecords.com
website: www.easyliferecords.com

*******************************************************
NOTE: The information in this email is confidential and may be legally
privileged. If you are not the intended recipient, you must not read, use or
disseminate that information. Please notify the sender. This e-mail is
provided for general information purposes only. For the avoidance of doubt
the contents of this email will not constitute a legally binding contract.

Any opinions or advice contained in this email are not necessarily those of
Easylife Records Limited. Although this email and any attachments are
believed to be free of any virus, or any other defect which might affect any
computer or IT system into which they are received and opened, it is the
responsibility of the recipient to ensure that they are virus free and no
responsibility is accepted by Easylife Records Limited for any loss or
damage arising in any way from receipt or use thereof. Further information
on Easylife Records Limited can be found at www.easyliferecords.com
********************************************************


--
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
